response.explain: The execution error indicates that the robot is not within two meters of the stove, so it cannot put the tray on the stove. The robot needs to move closer to the stove before it can put the tray on it.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the stove.
(2) Put the tray on the stove.
(3) Move the robot to the fridge.
(4) Open the fridge.
(5) Grasp the bacon from the fridge.
(6) Put the bacon on the tray.
(7) Cook the bacon.
